plot: Bart finally learns to admire Homer, but a visit from a magical singing janitor changes everything they thought they knew.

Marge and her friends watch an adult British TV show and she keeps her family occupied, so she can enjoy her ladies night without interruption. Marge gets hungover from her ladies night, she forces Homer to take the kids the church. Bart and Lisa go to Sunday School with Helen. Homer soon gets bored and he allows Maggie to cause a fuss so he can get out of church. Homer becomes furious when Bart humiliates him. Homer decides to take Bart to his workplace, he starts to respect his father, but his admiration towards his father becomes short-lived when he receives a visit from a singing janitor. Bart decides he wants to become a firefighter instead of a nuclear worker.
